name: China America Holdings Inc.
overview:
China America Holdings, Inc. (China America) is engaged in the refrigerant business. The Company, through its subsidiary, Shanghai AoHong Industry Co., Ltd. (AoHong), is engaged in the sale and distribution of assorted chemicals in China. China America generates revenue through the sale and distribution of liquid coolants.

Through its subsidiary, China America distributes hydrofluorocarbon (HFC) refrigerants utilized in a range of applications, primarily as coolants in automobile, residential and commercial air conditioning systems, refrigerators, fire extinguishing agents and assorted aerosol sprays.

The Company’s customers include manufacturers and retailers of air conditioning systems, refrigerators, automobiles, coolants, pharmaceuticals and chemicals in China. During the fiscal year ended September 30, 2010 (fiscal 2010), it acquired Jinqian Chemical. On August 16, 2010, it acquired a 100% interest in Guangzhou AoHong.

acquisitions.source_description: China America Holdings in Definitive Agreement to Acquire China Ziyang Technology Company, Limited as Wholly Owned Subsidiary
